Main Screen:
 1: Level-this is your current level. You level-up automatically when you gain experience.
 2: Money-this is how much money you currently have. You can sell crops and use money to buy crops in the Silo/Shop.
 3: Experience-this is how much experience you currently have. You gain experience by harvesting crops.
 4: Fields-these are the fields you can plant crops in. You gain more by leveling up.

Getting Started:\n If this is your first time playing you will only have 3 fields. You also have 0 money but don\'t despair, you have enough wheat to plant one of your fields. You click on one of the fields and the seed selector will appear. The seed selector will show the seeds you have in your inventory and how many of each you have. When you click on the seed you would like to have planted, it begins to grow in the field that you had selected. Once the crop is done growing, it will say \"Ready!\" and all you have to do to harvest it is click on it. When you harvest, several things are happening, first, you get at least 1 and at most 3 seeds back. Second, your experience goes up. Your experience increases based on the type of crop you harvested. When your experience points get beyond 10 points, you level up and your experience points are docked 10 points. When you level up you gain 1 extra farm field for each level. After you have grown enough wheat you can click on the Silo/Shop button where you can see a full list of all crops and how many you have of each. Since you don\'t have any money yet, you need to click on the wheat crop which you should now have several of. Sell some of your wheat (best to keep some just in case) and now you have some money to buy a different type of crop. Now you know the basics. Good Luck!
